title: "Unable to connect you to the login queues"

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I've tried all of the steps for login issues, I have installed the Hextech Repair and nothing has helped. I've been struggling with this for 2 days now and it's getting annoying. If anyone knows how to solve this problem it would be appreciated. Rito help.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: I've been seeing a number of these login queue issues today, but so far it seems like most of them have been cleared up. Since yours is so much more recent, let's go ahead and run a trace route to check out how your connection is looking after it leaves your network. Use something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to run a trace to our NA servers at 192.64.170.1. Post the results here so I can go over it with you!
